general_intern_details:
<!--StartFragment-->

General Business Development Interns work on all tasks focused on the backend of Robotics For All. Some tasks include cold emailing, event planning, outreach, interviewing, and more.\
\
This is the best intern path for anyone who may not have as many technical skills or experiences, but is interested in working with our organization.\
\
Having experience in the following will be beneficial: ​

* Fluency in a second language
* Experience working with teams
* Event organization
* General administrative work 
* Writing grants or strong analytical skills



<!--EndFragment-->

positions.name: No Currently Open Positions. Check back soon!
